<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_email"><sys_script_email action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>jira_sp_link</name><new_lines_to_html>false</new_lines_to_html><script><![CDATA[(function runMailScript(current, template, email, email_action, event) {
  var link = gs.getProperty('glide.servlet.uri') + 'sp?id=jira_issues_form&action=2&table=x_momo_jira_integr_issue&sys_id=' + current.getUniqueValue();
  template.print(link);
})(current, template, email, email_action, event);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_email</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>douglas.schamberg</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-02-22 16:34:27</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>24183eb21b83c81048a242e58d4bcb62</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>jira_sp_link</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Jira Integration" source="x_momo_jira_integr">ec964aa3dbd2c810f25513296896194c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Jira Integration">ec964aa3dbd2c810f25513296896194c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_email_24183eb21b83c81048a242e58d4bcb62</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>douglas.schamberg@movement.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-02-22 16:35:26</sys_updated_on></sys_script_email></record_update>
